Installation¶

Prerequisite¶

The required environment for SeqMM package:

Python 3 C++ compiler (with C++11 supports) and SWIG (version 3.0 or later)

  • For Linux

  • For Mac or Windows

For successful compilation, Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0 is required.

github installation¶

Currently, we only support installation from our github repository. You can install the package by the following console command:

1
pip install git+http://github.com/ZebinYang/SeqMM.git

manual installation¶

Currently, we only support installation from our github repository. You can install the package by the following console command:

First, download the source codes from http://github.com/ZebinYang/SeqMM.git, unzip and switch to the folder.

Then, run the following shell commands to finish installation. .. code-block:

:linenos:
pip install -r requirements.txt
python setup.py install
